## stripeAccountMode() function

Given a Stripe API key, infers whether the Stripe client was initialized in `live` mode or `test` mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stripeAccountMode: (api_key: string) => "live" | "test"
```

</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

"live" \| "test"
